20110128160854.000|20110128160855.000|CC1|     WE PLAY BALL TOGETHER.     
20110128160855.000|20110128160855.000|CC1|        [ Male Announcer ]      
20110128160855.000|20110128160857.000|CC1|  CHANTIX IS A NON-NICOTINE PILL
20110128160857.000|20110128160857.000|CC1|      PROVEN TO HELP PEOPLE     
20110128160857.000|20110128160858.000|CC1|          QUIT SMOKING.         
20110128160858.000|20110128160900.000|CC1|  IT REDUCES THE URGE TO SMOKE. 
20110128160900.000|20110128160900.000|CC1|      AND YOU CAN EVEN SMOKE    
20110128160900.000|20110128160902.000|CC1|      DURING THE FIRST WEEK.    
20110128160902.000|20110128160902.000|CC1|    QUITTING ON MY OWN NEVER    
20110128160902.000|20110128160904.000|CC1|      SEEMED TO BE ENOUGH.      
20110128160904.000|20110128160906.000|CC1|   THIS TIME IT WAS DIFFERENT.  
20110128160906.000|20110128160907.000|CC1|     THIS TIME I WAS READY.     
20110128160907.000|20110128160908.000|CC1|     READY TO TAKE CONTROL.     
20110128160908.000|20110128160910.000|CC1|   READY TO TALK TO MY DOCTOR.  
20110128160910.000|20110128160910.000|CC1|  [ Male Announcer ] SOME PEOPLE
20110128160910.000|20110128160912.000|CC1|     HAD CHANGES IN BEHAVIOR,   
20110128160912.000|20110128160912.000|CC1|        THINKING OR MOOD,       
20110128160912.000|20110128160914.000|CC1|      HOSTILITY, AGITATION,     
20110128160914.000|20110128160914.000|CC1|   DEPRESSED MOOD AND SUICIDAL  
20110128160914.000|20110128160917.000|CC1|       THOUGHTS OR ACTIONS

20110128160925.000|20110128160925.000|CC1|             OR OTHER

20110128160932.000|20110128160934.000|CC1|        OR SKIN REACTIONS,

20110128160936.000|20110128160936.000|CC1|         AS SOME OF THESE

20110128160938.000|20110128160938.000|CC1|     DOSING MAY BE DIFFERENT    
20110128160938.000|20110128160940.000|CC1|   IF YOU HAVE KIDNEY PROBLEMS. 
20110128160940.000|20110128160940.000|CC1|          UNTIL YOU KNOW
